reporter_caption.center: BOYLES v. NORTH CAROLINA REAL ESTATE COMM., 365 N.C. 189 (2011)

caption.center: Leonard A. Boyles, Jr. V. North Carolina Real Estate Commission.

opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of April 2011 by Respondent-Appellee to Dismiss Appeal:
"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of April 2011."
